page.title: 18RURAL WILDLIFE.
page.content: This area has a lot of wildlife, both animals and flowers.There are a variety of habitats,including river + banks;parkland;mixed,deciduous woods; fields and hedgerows.We looked at a small area and found that we had{Mice, {Stoats,Foxes,Badgers,Rabbits,Grey {Squirrels}and{Red Deer,}in and around the edges of the woods.During the spring there are also many{Hares}in the winter-sown Wheat fields. {Crows}and{Chaffinches}were our most common birds,with a lot of{Blue Tits, {Blackbirds}and{House Martins.}We have some{Owls}and{Kestrels}too.We found no {Sparrows}at all and few{Starlings. } The spring hedgerows have{Cowslips, {Bluebells,Primroses}+ many{Snowdrops. The woods have a lot of{Wild Garlic. Our local landowner has made two small Nature Reserves.One is an{Orchid}pond especially to encourage{Snipe}to nest.
